Package API

Interface NotificationAPI

All Known Implementing Classes:
NotificationEmail
public interface NotificationAPI
Interface for Notification of Students

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Boolean sendAddWaitList​(Student se, Course cse, java.lang.String indexID)
    Notify student of success of adding to waitlist
    java.lang.Boolean sendRegSuccess​(Student se, java.util.ArrayList<Course> cse, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> indexID)
    Notify student of success of adding courses
    java.lang.Boolean sendSwapSuccess​(java.lang.String[] sMetric, Course[] ci, java.lang.String[] indSwap)
    Notify swapper and swappee of the swop success

  • Method Details

    • sendSwapSuccess

      java.lang.Boolean sendSwapSuccess​(java.lang.String[] sMetric, Course[] ci, java.lang.String[] indSwap)
      Notify swapper and swappee of the swop success
      Parameters:
      sMetric - the metric of swapper reqestor [0] and swappee [1]
      ci - the Course of swapper reqestor [0] and swappee [1]
      indSwap - the index id of swapper reqestor [0] and swappee [1]
      Returns:
      Success/Failure of sending swap notification

    • sendRegSuccess

      java.lang.Boolean sendRegSuccess​(Student se, java.util.ArrayList<Course> cse, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> indexID)
      Notify student of success of adding courses
      Parameters:
      se - Student which requested the courses
      cse - Courses which the student reqested for
      indexID - the IndexIDs of the Courses which the student reqested for, in the same sequence as cse
      Returns:
      Success/Failure of sending notification

    • sendAddWaitList

      java.lang.Boolean sendAddWaitList​(Student se, Course cse, java.lang.String indexID)
      Notify student of success of adding to waitlist
      Parameters:
      se - Student which requested the course
      ci - Course which the student reqested for
      indexID - the IndexID of the Course which the student reqested for
      Returns:
      Success/Failure of sending notification
